teams.name: McGraw Hill Financial
teams.loan_because:
Corporate Responsibility is fundamental to MHFI. It guides who we are, how we conduct ourselves and how we interact with those around us.

Corporate Responsibility Essentials at MHFI encompass:

– Financial Essentials – we help to provide the fundamental financial knowledge that can build better lives, stronger communities and stable economies and financial markets. 

– Community Essentials – we help deploy and foster the resources and skills that lead to smarter, stronger, more inclusive communities. Our employees are integral partners in our dedication to this critical purpose. 

– Environmental Essentials – we offer innovative business services that promote sustainability while applying best practice to reduce the environmental footprint of our operations.
teams.description:
McGraw Hill Financial is a high-growth, high-margin benchmarks, content and analytics company serving the capital and commodity markets. MHFI believes a responsible business is one that delivers value for investors, customers, employees and communities; makes wise use of natural resources; and treats people fairly.

We are home to some of the most iconic brands in finance and business, including: Standard & Poor’s Ratings Services, S&P Capital IQ, S&P Dow Jones Indices, Platts, J.D. Power, and McGraw Hill Construction. Our independent credit ratings, indices, analytics, price assessments and research provide clients with the essential intelligence to manage risk and identify opportunities to grow.

teams.description:
Made of individual kiva lenders who are concerned about the environmental impacts of their loans. This is a forum to notify each other of environmentally sustainable loans that are needing funding. Sustainable development projects include recycling, solar, re-use, organic agriculture, health, etc. 

We support enterprises that care about the earth and all of its inhabitants. We have no religious, racial or political affiliations of any kind. We want to encourage sustainable enterprises that recycle, reuse, repurpose and use environmentally sound agricultural and manufacturing practices. 
Many of us would like Kiva to develop environmental standards or criteria for their lending practices to prevent environmental impacts that would increase poverty for future generations.
Many people want to have a green portfolio, or at least a green component. 
Won't you join us in creating true sustainability that includes a healthy environment?

teams.description: We're a diverse group of women from the San Francisco Bay Area who love life, helping others and having fun. Many of us were given great opportunities that helped us get to where we are today and now we want to help others achieve their goals.

teams.name: AMK (Angkor Microfinance Kampuchea) Fan Club
teams.loan_because: We are fans of the microfinance instiution AMK and the work that they are doing in Cambodia.
teams.description:
We love AMK because of their social mission: 

"To help large numbers of poor people to improve their livelihood options through the delivery of appropriate and viable microfinance services."

teams.name: Bain & Company
teams.loan_because: Employees of Bain & Company want to make a difference in the world.
teams.description:
Bain & Company is one of the world's leading global business consulting firms, serving clients across six continents on issues of strategy, operations, technology, organization and mergers and acquisitions. Founded in 1973 on the principle that consultants must measure their success in terms of their clients' financial results, Bain's clients have historically out performed the stock market 4 to 1. With offices in all major cities, Bain has worked with over 3,900 major multinational and other corporations from every economic sector, in every region of the world. 

Bain’s business is helping to make our clients more valuable.  Our focus is on delivering results, not reports for our clients.  We emphasize practical recommendations and how to make them happen.  
Bain consultants celebrate impact, not intellectual elegance.  We are direct, practical and down-to-earth, and we always put our clients’ needs first.

teams.name: Won't you be my neighbor?
teams.loan_because: We are all neighbors.

teams.name: Cal Poly SLO Alums
teams.loan_because: lending a hand is more valuable and valued than giving a handout.
teams.description: Those who have adopted the Cal Poly "Learn by Doing" philosophy.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

teams.name: Pura Vida Costa Rica - Fans of EDESA
teams.loan_because: Creemos que la microfinanza es un método viable para ayudar a los costarricenses a salir de la pobreza. We believe in the capacity of microfinance to empower Costa Ricans to lift themselves out of poverty.
teams.description: Proveemos recursos financieros a microempresarios en Costa Rica para ayudarles a mejorar su calidad de vida.  We provide financial resources to microentrepreneurs in Costa Rica to help them improve their quality of life.

teams.name: Capital to the Coast 2011
teams.loan_because: We want to make a difference, and believe that micro-loans are a great way to empower people and reduce poverty worldwide.
teams.description: In cycling from Ottawa to Halifax, nearly 1500 km, in ten days, we want to promote the work of micro-loans, and encourage and inspire people to lend through Kiva, and make a sustainable and measurable difference.

teams.name: Marie Forleo's Kiva Lending Team
teams.whereabouts: Global Baby!  HQ in NYC & LA
teams.loan_because: We're uber passionate about making a difference.  Nothing makes us more excited than using our skills and resources to increase prosperity, aliveness and well-being on the planet.
teams.description: We're a global group of creators committed to doing our best work, giving back and having a GREAT time while we do it!  Wanna join us? Requirements:  a can-do-attitude, sense of humor, a passion for possibility, and burning desire to use your creativity to be of service!

teams.name: DownloadHelper Users
